00062 #define ZIP_SHA1_BLOCK_SIZE  64
00063 #define ZIP_SHA1_DIGEST_SIZE 20
00064 
00065 
00069 class ZIP_API CSha1
00070 {
00071  friend class CRandomPool;
00072 public:
00073  CSha1();
00074  CSha1(const CSha1& sha1)
00075  {
00076   *this = sha1;
00077  }
00078  
00079  CSha1& operator = (const CSha1& sha1)
00080  {
00081   memcpy(m_count, sha1.m_count, 2 * sizeof(UINT));
00082   memcpy(m_hash, sha1.m_hash, 5 * sizeof(UINT));
00083   memcpy(m_wbuf, sha1.m_wbuf, 16 * sizeof(UINT));
00084   return *this;
00085  }
00089  void Begin();
00090 
00094  void Compile(); 
00095 
00106  void Hash(const char* pData, UINT uSize);
00107 
00114  void End(char* pData);
00115 private:
00116  UINT m_count[2];
00117     UINT m_hash[5];
00118     UINT m_wbuf[16]; 
00119 };
